summary: This module implements a suite of neural network models for speech enhancement and audio-to-audio transformation. It provides encoder‑mask‑decoder architectures, predictive models that estimate encoded audio coefficients, and score‑based generative approaches, handling data preprocessing, forward propagation, loss computation, and training/evaluation workflows within the NeMo framework.
business_intent: To improve the quality of recorded speech by removing noise, reverberation, and other distortions, thereby boosting the performance of downstream automatic speech recognition, voice communication, and assistive listening applications.
